column3: 2015) send sympathy gifts video tribute send sympathy card julia jane bartine was born on september 29
column5: texas to edgar mc. coy and cardelia eugenia allen mc. coy. on january 18
column7: she married carl david bartine. he preceded her in death in 1995. she has lived in katy since 1993
column8: where she was a member of the first baptist church. julia was an avid tennis player when she was younger
column9: and most recently was a member of the aarp club. julia passed away on friday
column13: at the age of 88 years. she is survived by her daughter
column14: barbara jo guzick and her husband louis m. of katy; son
column15: david l. bartine and his wife julie ann of katy; grandchildren
column21: and chloe elizabeth bartine; and great grandson
column22: christian monogold. she was preceded in death by her parents; brothers
column23: alton winslow mc. coy and edgar mc. coy
column27: and helen john buck; and a daughter
column28: carol ann johnson and her husband larry johnson. the family will receive friends from 6:00 p. m. to 8:00 p. m. on sunday
column30: 2015 at the schmidt funeral home chapel
column31: in katy. visitation will also be held from 9:00 a. m. to 11:00 a. m. tuesday
column33: 2015 at the turcotte-piper mortuary in kingsville
column35: followed by a graveside service at 11:30 a. m. at restland cemetery in bishop
column36: texas. those wishing to make memorial gifts may do so to the bishop cemetery association
column39: tx 78343 or to the first baptist church
